TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LeftMargin extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Math.TwipsMeasureType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is m:lMargin.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **lMargin (Left Margin)** This element specifies the left margin for math, in twips. If this element is omitted, no left margin is used. In other words, when the element is absent, the default value of the option is *0*. When the element is present and the val attribute is absent, the default of the val attribute is *1440* (or 1 inch). Math margins are added to the paragraph settings for margins. If the sum of lMargin and rMargin exceed the width available, lMargin should be ignored. [*Example*: The following XML demonstrates an lMargin setting of 1". ```xml ``` *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |mathPr (§22.1.2.62)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Value)|Specifies the value, in twips, of the parent element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_TwipsMeasure* simple type (§22.9.2.14).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TwipsMeasure) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
